metadata.title: CVE-2016-6317 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Action Record in Ruby on Rails 4.2.x before 4.2.7.1 does not properlyconsider differences in parameter handling between the Active Recordcomponent and the JSON implementation, which allows remote attackers tobypass intended database-query restrictions and perform NULL checks ortrigger missing WHERE clauses via a crafted request, as demonstrated bycertain "[nil]" values, a related issue to CVE-2012-2660, CVE-2012-2694,and CVE-2013-0155.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6317` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rails - 2:4.2.7.1-1
ruby-actionmailer - 2:4.2.7.1-1
ruby-actionpack - 2:4.2.7.1-1
ruby-actionview - 2:4.2.7.1-1
ruby-activejob - 2:4.2.7.1-1
ruby-activemodel - 2:4.2.7.1-1
ruby-activerecord - 2:4.2.7.1-1
ruby-activesupport - 2:4.2.7.1-1
ruby-rails - 2:4.2.7.1-1
ruby-railties - 2:4.2.7.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rails package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:4.2.7.1-1').
